tab1.title1: Welcome to the Laokia ARK Server!
tab1.text1:
Hello, and welcome to the Laokia ARK server!

This server is currently just a test to see if it is something my sister and I can run without encountering too many issues or being subjected to too much stress.

Unfortunately, at the moment I have a lot of health issues, and I have to be very careful about my stress levels due to that.

I would love to find some great people to just chill and have fun playing ARK with, so please join us if that's something you are interested in!


Owner - Ashley / AshCamo / Laokia
Co-Owner - Donna / Littlebird / Littlebird2424
tab1.text2:
- Keep things pleasant so the server is a place to chill and have fun.

- The server may be set to PVP at times for breeding or events; Please respect others and only engage in PVP if it is mutually agreed upon.

- The server discord can be used to get in touch with the server owner.

- The PUBLIC STATUS IS A TEST, and due to the owner's health issues if it causes too much stress the server will be made private.

- We apologize for this! However caution is unfortunately necessary with the current state of her health. Thank you for understanding!

tab2.text1:
Singleplayer Settings - On

Max Difficulty - On

Max Wild Dino Levels - 150

Stack Size - 5x


XP Multiplier - 1.5x

Taming Multiplier - 5x
Passive Tame Interval - 0.1
Wild Food Drain - 3x
Wild Torpor Drain - 0.5x

Harvesting Multiplier - 3.5x
Harvest Health - 2x

Mating Interval - 0.1
Egg Hatch Speed - 8x
Baby Mature Speed - 10x
Imprint Stat Scale - 3x


Player Stats: Food & Water - 5 / Weight - 10 / Others - 2

Wild Dino Stats: Stamina - 2 / Weight - 6 / Others - 1

Tamed Dino Stats: Health & Damage - 0.75 / Stamina - 3 / Weight - 6 / Others - 2

Tamed Dino Added Stats: Health & Damage - 0.5 / Stamina - 2 / Weight - 6 / Others - 1.5

Tamed Dino Affinity Stats: Health & Damage - 1 / Stamina - 4 / Weight - 6 / Others - 3
